function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapidly developing drugs and vaccines for COVID-19 by utilization of robots and CPS technologies","Impact":"Potential risks of incomplete testing and evaluation, leading to unforeseen side effects or ineffectiveness.","Mitigation":"Thorough testing and evaluation processes, strict regulatory oversight, and collaboration with medical experts.","Technologies":"Robots, CPS technologies","People":"Patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, medical regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Helping hospitalized patients in transporting and serving food or medicines by robots","Impact":"Risk of potential virus transmission through contact with robots or contaminated surfaces.","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of robots, strict hygiene protocols, and use of protective equipment by healthcare workers.","Technologies":"Robots","People":"Hospitalized patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Hospital administration, healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"Developing unique treatment protocol for each patient and identifying patients with a higher possibility of developing severe symptoms based on their initial symptoms as a result of the utilization of AI and big data technology for analyzing patients' historical health records and response to current treatment","Impact":"Risk of data privacy breaches, misinterpretation of data leading to incorrect treatment decisions.","Mitigation":"Strict data security measures, anonymization of data, regular validation and oversight by medical professionals.","Technologies":"AI, big data technology","People":"Patients, medical professionals","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, data management organizations"},{"Description":"Offering extensive healthcare services as monitoring patients' health in a real-time manner and tracking their medicine use periodically by the integration of smart medical devices with IoMT technology.","Impact":"Potential risk of data accuracy and reliability, vulnerability to cyber attacks on connected medical devices.","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and validation of medical devices, robust cybersecurity measures, encryption of data transmission.","Technologies":"Smart medical devices, IoMT technology","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, IoMT service providers"}]}
